title: Tutoring/Mentoring
body:
Could someone possibly help me improve on league. I mostly play JG but would like to improve on that and learn top and adc.
Thx
Username: JOrmesher.... if needed.

replies.body:
you only play Bots and normals. its impossible to help and give tips without you playing any ranked games.
Normals are too "troll" to rely on in terms of improving properly.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=JOrmesher

Well 1 big thing i see is you die a ridiculous amount. You have more than 10 deaths in most of your games... there are multiple games where you have a death every 2 minutes... you legit must have spent more time dead than alive in those games.

I really don't know how to fix that. You're either intentionally feeding or have 0 clue on how to play, in which case, you need to watch streams/youtube vids and just look at "proper" gameplay.

You never buy control wards or change your trinket. both are necessary.
Thx for the comment I find that rather helpful. And your right, I do practically have no idea on how to play. Hence I'm looking for someone to help.
You are feeding a lot in your games. So like stop dying, because deaths hurt not only u but your team
